mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, APP_SDITM_ID, APP_SDITM_LNM, APP_SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, PNM_CRI_DS, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL

, A.APP_SDITM_LNM, A.APP_SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.PNM_CRI_DS, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_APP_SDITM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, APP_SDITM_ID, APP_SDITM_LNM, APP_SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, PNM_CRI_DS, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appSditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert into WAQ_APP_SDITM
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
APP_SDITM_ID,
APP_SDITM_LNM,
APP_SDITM_PNM,
LNM_CRI_DS,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_RMK,
VRF_CD,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
PNM_CRI_DS,
DATA_TYPE,
DATA_LEN,
DATA_SCAL,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{appSditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appSditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appSditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update WAQ_APP_SDITM
APP_SDITM_ID = #{appSditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SDITM_LNM = #{appSditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SDITM_PNM = #{appSditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_APP_SDITM set APP_SDITM_ID = #{appSditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SDITM_LNM = #{appSditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SDITM_PNM = #{appSditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.APP_SDITM_ID, A.APP_SDITM_LNM, A.APP_SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_APP_SDITM A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.APP_SDITM_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_APP_SDITM B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.APP_SDITM_LNM = A.APP_SDITM_LNM ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_APP_SDITM A SET (A.APP_SDITM_LNM, A.APP_SDITM_PNM) = (SELECT CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR' THEN APP_SDITM_LNM||'_S'||B.DATA_LEN ELSE CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN CASE WHEN B.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN APP_SDITM_LNM||'_N'||B.DATA_LEN||'_'||B.DATA_SCAL ELSE APP_SDITM_LNM||'_N'||B.DATA_LEN END ELSE APP_SDITM_LNM END END ,CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR' THEN APP_SDITM_PNM||'_S'||B.DATA_LEN ELSE CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN CASE WHEN B.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN APP_SDITM_PNM||'_N'||B.DATA_LEN||'_'||B.DATA_SCAL ELSE APP_SDITM_PNM||'_N'||B.DATA_LEN END ELSE APP_SDITM_PNM END END FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND INSTR(A.APP_SDITM_LNM,'_') = 0
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 APP표준항목 존재....(AI012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_APP_SDITM D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.APP_SDITM_LNM = D.APP_SDITM_LNM AND A.APP_SDITM_PNM = D.APP_SDITM_PNM AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

--검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.APP_SDITM_LNM = D.APP_SDITM_LNM
AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_SDITM D WHERE A.APP_SDITM_LNM = D.APP_SDITM_LNM AND A.APP_SDITM_PNM = D.APP_SDITM_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND REGEXP_LIKE(UPPER(D.STWD_LNM) ,'_N|_S' ) AND REGEXP_LIKE(SUBSTR(D.STWD_LNM, LENGTH(RTRIM(D.STWD_LNM, '1234567890'))+1, LENGTH(D.STWD_LNM)), '^[0-9]*$') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'API' AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND REGEXP_LIKE(SUBSTR(SUBSTR(D.STWD_LNM,1,INSTR(D.STWD_LNM,'_')-1), LENGTH(RTRIM(SUBSTR(D.STWD_LNM,1,INSTR(D.STWD_LNM,'_')-1), '1234567890'))+1, LENGTH(SUBSTR(D.STWD_LNM,1,INSTR(D.STWD_LNM,'_')-1))), '^[0-9]*$') )
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND SUBSTR(A.APP_SDITM_LNM, INSTR(A.APP_SDITM_LNM,'_')+2, LENGTH(A.APP_SDITM_LNM)) != NVL2(A.DATA_SCAL,A.DATA_LEN||'_'||A.DATA_SCAL,A.DATA_LEN)
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND CASE WHEN A.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR' THEN 'S' ELSE 'N' END != SUBSTR(SUBSTR(A.APP_SDITM_LNM,INSTR(A.APP_SDITM_LNM,'_')+1,LENGTH(A.APP_SDITM_LNM)),1,1)
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND CASE WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(A.SDITM_PNM,'N'),1,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '9' THEN 'N' ELSE 'C' END = 'N'

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_SDITM D WHERE A.APP_SDITM_LNM = D.APP_SDITM_LNM AND NVL(A.APP_SDITM_PNM , '_') = NVL(D.APP_SDITM_PNM , '_') AND NVL(A.LNM_CRI_DS , '_') = NVL(D.LNM_CRI_DS , '_') AND NVL(A.PNM_CRI_DS , '_') = NVL(D.PNM_CRI_DS , '_') AND NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '_') = NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '_') AND NVL(A.DATA_TYPE , '_') = NVL(D.DATA_TYPE , '_') AND NVL(A.DATA_LEN , 0) = NVL(D.DATA_LEN , 0) AND NVL(A.DATA_SCAL , 0) = NVL(D.DATA_SCAL , 0) AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_APP_SDITM
RVW_STS_CD = '1' , -- 승인 RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATETIME , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_APP_SDITM A SET (APP_SDITM_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.APP_SDITM_ID AS APP_SDITM_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_APP_SDITM B WHERE B.APP_SDITM_LNM = A.APP_SDITM_LNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_SDITM B WHERE B.APP_SDITM_LNM = A.APP_SDITM_LNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_APP_SDITM A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.APP_SDITM_LNM = A.APP_SDITM_LNM )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_APP_SDITM SELECT A.APP_SDITM_ID
FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_APP_SDITM A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.APP_SDITM_LNM = A.APP_SDITM_LNM ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_APP_SDITM SELECT A.APP_SDITM_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATETIME AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_APP_SDITM A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
